meanings.definition: A type of fabric used for making shirts.
meanings.sent1: She bought some soft shirtings to sew a new shirt.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of shirtings in different colors.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled coffee on his fresh shirtings before work.
meanings.sent4: The shirtings felt like a cloud against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The shirtings gleamed under the bright store lights.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing or using shirts.
meanings.sent1: His shirtings were always neatly ironed for work.
meanings.sent2: She loved the feel of new shirtings against her skin.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his collection of shirtings was taking over the closet.
meanings.sent4: Her shirtings were like a shield against the chilly wind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful shirtings brightened up his wardrobe.
